definition: the sound of the wind/to soar
absolutely ridiculous (idiom); preposterous/the height of folly
to pass on errors or lies (idiom); the propagation of misconceptions
reductio ad absurdum/arguing by contradiction/also called 反證法|反证法
a tiny lapse can lead to a huge mistake (idiom); a minor discrepancy leading to enormous losses
pinyin: shi1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , miu4 yi3 qian1 li3

definition: the slightest difference leads to a huge error (idiom)/a miss is as good as a mile
pinyin: cha1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , miu4 yi3 qian1 li3

definition: variant of 悖謬|悖谬[bei4 miu4]

sentences.english: It was which involves proving them wrong.
sentences.chinese: 而是我要證明他們是紕謬的。

sentences.english: Bartholomew grabbed a loaf of French bread.
sentences.chinese: 巴塞羅謬手裏抓着一根法式麪包。

sentences.english: Now Muriel's family is in the dining room.
sentences.chinese: 現在謬里爾的家庭在餐廳就餐。

sentences.english: She thinks it wrong that he didn't answer the phone.
sentences.chinese: 她以爲他其時不接電話是紕謬的。

definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
(literary) (final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 呢[ne5] or 啊[a1])
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
